properties.description: 同步 dm_d_inst 中医院数据

source.query:
SELECT 
	inst_code, 
	inst_name, 
	province_code, 
	city_code, 
	county_code, 
	websit, 
	telephone, 
	inst_grade, 
	inst_grade_level, 
	inst_type, 
	inst_type_l1, 
	inst_type_l2, 
	inst_type_l3, 
	inst_type_l4, 
	county_flag, 
	cold_chain, 
	tnpr_flag, 
	nhc_certify, 
	register_time, 
	deregister_time, 
	close_time, 
	operation_status, 
	status_provided_by_retail, 
	validate_status, 
	validate_time, 
	validate_result, 
	is_active, 
	active_desc, 
	status, 
	postcode, 
	business_scope, 
	uscc, 
	gps_x, 
	gps_y, 
	address, 
	township_code, 
	inst_type_l2_code, 
	economic_type, 
	military_flag, 
	medicare_flag,
	md5(concat_ws(',', inst_code, inst_name, province_code, city_code, county_code, websit, telephone, inst_grade, inst_grade_level, inst_type, inst_type_l1, inst_type_l2, inst_type_l3, inst_type_l4, county_flag, cold_chain, tnpr_flag, nhc_certify, register_time, deregister_time, close_time, operation_status, status_provided_by_retail, validate_status, validate_time, validate_result, is_active, active_desc, status, postcode, business_scope, uscc, gps_x, gps_y, address, township_code, inst_type_l2_code, economic_type, military_flag, medicare_flag)) md5_check
from dm_d_inst ddi 
where inst_type_l1 = '医疗机构' and inst_type_l2 = '医院';
